sentences.english: The justice ' clerk assert that the justice is functi officio.
sentences.chinese: 法官的秘书宣称法官已不再有管辖权。

sentences.english: She announced that his wife had just given birth to quadruplets .
sentences.chinese: 她宣称他的妻子刚刚生了四胞胎。

sentences.english: Lyon claim that Chelsea's attempts to sign midfielder Michael Essien have all but collapsed.
sentences.chinese: 里昂宣称切尔西试图签下中场埃辛的事情以失败告终。

sentences.english: The profession and the public do not appreciate that advertising claims come without proof in the case of diets.
sentences.chinese: 医生同业和大众没有察知广告所宣称的饮食并无论证。

sentences.english: C. back one year, put the year zero in the gap, and declare the disagreement solved.
sentences.chinese: 支持一年，投入年调零空白，并且宣称解决的分歧。

sentences.english: “We’re an upscale gentleman’s club, ” he said disdainfully.
sentences.chinese: “我们可是一家高档绅士俱乐部，”他倨傲地宣称。

sentences.english: However, Gazidis claimed that there was no limit to what they could offer.
sentences.chinese: 但是，加齐迪斯宣称并没有薪水上的限制。

sentences.english: But Singh asserted that India backed both the panel and its chairman.
sentences.chinese: 辛格宣称，印度既支持该专门小组，也支持它的主席。

sentences.english: Once again, Vidal was there to claim that the U.S. government saw it coming all along.
sentences.chinese: 再一次地，威达尔宣称所有这些都是美国政府引发的。

sentences.english: The Figure Model's Guild declares modelling to be "an art form in itself".
sentences.chinese: 人体模特协会宣称“模特本身就是一种艺术形式”。

sentences.english: The Tunisian economic miracle was an illusion, they claimed.
sentences.chinese: 他们宣称，突尼斯的经济奇迹只是一种幻象。

sentences.english: Such doubts have not stopped China claiming mastery over the clouds.
sentences.chinese: 这种怀疑并没有妨碍中国宣称已把云朵握在手中。

sentences.english: They claim at least 100 people have been killed in the Bishkek clashes.
sentences.chinese: 他们宣称至少有100人在比什凯克的冲突中死亡。

sentences.english: The pilot of the fighter plane even declares a near-collision.
sentences.chinese: 战斗机的飞行员甚至还宣称跟它有近距离碰触。

sentences.english: We plunked squarely down on the side of the government.
sentences.chinese: 我们断然宣称自己站在政府一边。

sentences.english: GE said it intended to reduce its annual dividend to 6 cents per share from 19 cents.
sentences.chinese: 奇异公司宣称将要调降年度股利19分降为每股6分。

definition: it is said/allegedly/according to reports/or so they say
to be known as/to be nicknamed/to be purportedly/to claim (often exaggeratedly or falsely)
to admit/to concede/to recognize/recognition (diplomatic, artistic etc)/to acknowledge
to proclaim/to make public or well known
to give orders/to spread news or rumors/to leak certain information intentionally
to confirm (sth to be true)/to verify
to declare to be untrue/to deny
